name: Terraformer (lolollili)
description: Using simple but powerful terrain editing tools, this pseudo-isometric scrolling simulator lets you lovingly craft your own 3D landscape, block by block. Be sure to share your worlds here! https://scratch.mit.edu/discuss/topic/417385 .  CREDITS: Music: Minecraft > Art: Inspired by Minecraft and Polytopia > UI: Inspired by Firefox > Programming: lisa_wolfgang on scratch > Ideas: Mostly lisa_wolfgang on scratch, although some features were inspired by Minecraft and great suggestions by the community! :)
